# Concluded Myers Briggs Personality Type &#8211;&nbsp;

# [ENFJ &#8220;Charismatic and inspiring Leader&#8221;](https://www.afriqueunique.org/portrait-of-an-enfj-extraverted-intuitive-feeling-judging-extraverted-feeling-with-introverted-intuition/)

## Net Worth: **$200 million &#8211; 2018**
